name: Brandflow
tag_list: video, marketing-video, video-production, video-studio, web-marketing, internet-marketing, web-video
overview:
Brandflow is a marketing video studio based in San Francisco, CA. The company specializes in complete, end-to-end solutions that go beyond traditional video production.

The flat-rate service offering includes complete animated video production, a feature-rich web video player and detailed video analytics. The company’s 90 second promotional videos consist of high quality animation backed by professional voice-over, music and professional script development.

Brandflow has extensive experience serving SaaS, web, software and technology companies. Clients include Microsoft, Symantec, Freescale Semiconductor, Cisco, Dell, Pandora, Intuit, AMD, Ubisoft and hundreds of other respected companies.
